con:testStep.name: Update product count property

con:config.script:
def productCount = testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("productCount") as int
productCount = productCount + 2
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "productCount" , "$productCount") log.info "productCount is $productCount"
